1.0.0.name: wordpress/paypal-shop
1.0.0.description:
ecommerce for wordpress plugin is very easy way to use wordpress to sell your products online . This plugin will use existing wordpress function to create shopping environment under your blog . Adding a product with plugin is as easy as to add new post . You can use this plugin without any third party activation or integration . 

Plugin have built in seo feature which user can enable and disable from plugin admin option bar . We have tried our best to make it simple with maximum functionality . 

This is the only ecommerce plugin which comes with in built seo feature . User has option to choose weither they want to use this plugins seo or any other seo plugin for products . I recommend you to use eithor in built seo or yoast wordpress seo plugin . 

visit http://phppoet.com/ecommerce-for-wordpress/ for support and feature request .

front side demo available at <
